de.systemagmbh.common.io.writer
Class CSysTableWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.common.io.writer.CSysTableWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Deprecated. As of release 2.5, replaced by de.systemagmbh.tools.io.CSysTableWriter

public class CSysTableWriter
extends Object
implements Runnable

CSysTableWriter writes a ISysTableModel on a PrintWriter or into a file; Useful for creating Excel importable Textfiles or dumping on screen etc.

Example: The following fragment dumps the System Properties into a file named "systemprops.txt" using a semicolon as delimiter. 

 
 
import de.systemagmbh.common.table.CSysPropertyTable;
...
                try
                {
                        CSysPropertyTable table = new CSysPropertyTable(System.getProperties());
                        CSysTableWriter writer=new CSysTableWriter(table,"systemprops.txt",";");
                        writer.run();
                }
                catch(IOException ex)
                {
                        ex.printStackTrace();
                        System.exit(1);
                }
                System.exit(0);

Version:
